attributes.action: Sack Alistair Darling/Geoff Hoon and all Labour MP's whose expenses are extortionate (even if in the letter of the rules)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that it is disgusting for the common people to be ordered to pay extra taxes -  car taxes - fuel taxes etc etc on the say so of a Chancellor who not only is inadequate but also dishonest.  The same principal applies to the rest of the Government starting with Mr. Brown who afterall if he was the CEO of a Public Company would be ultimately responsible and would have too pay the ultimate price.  An enquiry should also look into their 'pay offs' after all they were the people who firstly sanctioned Fred Goodwin's then tried too back track.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
